overview:
Joy is responsible for organizing and supporting the financial activities of the partnership and assisting portfolio companies with their financial and accounting needs. Joy was previously CFO for InterCAP Graphics where she was part of the management team that grew the company to a successful acquisition, and she played a key role in the acquisition of BIS Strategic Decisions which served as the foundation of GIGA Information Group. She has held management and accounting positions at several public accounting firms and a large public utility.

Joy received a Bachelor of Arts from The American University and is a Certified Public Accountant.
